version_description: - Minor bug fixes

- Improved media player
- Minor bug fixes

- Minor bug fixes

For iPad users: If the layout does not fit into the screen, please set the scale factor in the settings to "x0.8".
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

- Live API support
- General API extensions
- Minor performance improvements
- Minor bug fixes

For more information about the new API extensions, please visit http://msx.benzac.de/info/.

- Internal improvements
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved HTTPS support when setting up the start parameter
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved error handling
- Minor bug fixes

- Performance improvements for parsing and converting JSON data
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved video/audio error handling
- Minor bug fixes

- Fixed menu rendering issues
- API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated playback speed values
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor performance improvements
- Minor API extensions

- Minor improvements
- Slightly adapted application exit behavior
- Updated copyright notice

- AFK delay (time to hide the player, notifications, etc. when there are no interactions) has been slightly decreased
- The display of the start parameters has been improved by truncating too long values
- The application suspend/resume feature has been improved
- General API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Added more functions to customize the player (i.e. show video/audio related info image and/or text and hide/override default player buttons)
- Added more functions to customize the menu (i.e. set custom images instead of icons and change logo size)
- Slightly improved rendering performance
- General API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Added shortcut feature for option items and player buttons
- General API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved navigation management
- Added version suffix to make versions easier to identify
- The display of some translated labels has been improved by truncating too long values
- General API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Added long press feature to select an item without executing it (e.g. to access additional options)
- General API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated application font (updated to the latest roboto font version)
- Added more icons (updated to the latest material icons version)
- General API extensions
- Minor bug fixes

- Slightly speed up menu navigation
- Minor bug fixes
